subject: Received Only half of my order
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Customer Support,

Today, I have received a package with only half of my ordered product.
At 9th Dec. I have order a Simsonn Plus X pedal with Haptic Reactors, but
today I have only received the Haptic reactors. Could you please explain to
me what is happening?
My order number is:  SSN4590
I will be looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
Péter Gál

conversations.body_text: Hi Péter Gál,  We apologize for the delay; the DeCang pedals are temporarily out of stock. Your order is expected to begin delivery next week.

Thank you for the clarification. I will be waiting for the other half
of the order, the next week.

Best regards,
Péter Gál

service@simsonn.com
